{"id":794001316,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"8Â months","timestamp":1662567481,"status":14,"status_display":"Time Limit Exceeded","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/794001316/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Make The String Great","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\n    public String makeGood(String s) {\n        String p=s;\n        p=p.toLowerCase();\n        StringBuilder sb=new StringBuilder(s);\n        int i=0;\n        while(i<sb.length()-1)\n        {\n            if(Character.toString(sb.charAt(i)).equalsIgnoreCase(Character.toString(sb.charAt(i+1)))==true)\n            {\n                if(Character.isLowerCase(sb.charAt(i))==true && Character.isUpperCase(sb.charAt(i+1))==true){sb=sb.delete(i,i+2);i=0;}\n                else if(Character.isLowerCase(sb.charAt(i+1))==true && Character.isUpperCase(sb.charAt(i))==true){sb=sb.delete(i,i+2);i=0;}\n            }\n            else i+=1;;\n        }\n        return sb.toString();\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"make-the-string-great","has_notes":false}
